Reviews.Title: This is a waste of money
Reviews.Author: Alfred Delancey
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your money on this or any of the cameras in this Vivitar line. I am sure they make some fine products but this one and the 10 mp camera were absolute junk. All of the photos looked like they were taken with a cell phone and the video it took (supposedly HD) was a complete joke. There are plenty of other cheap cameras that do just fine.

Reviews.Title: Piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Nikki K
Reviews.Content: This is the biggest piece of crap I will never buy another Vivitar camera, it won't even take pictures and the sd card won't come out now that I inserted it. It is cheap looking too!!!

Reviews.Title: Worse than bad...DO NOT BUY.
Reviews.Author: aubreyhelene
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for our little guy to have as a cheap camera to have fun with and take pics with.  It's horrible.  I completely understand the pictures my almost 8 yr old takes being blurry, but even when I've shot with it, flash on- holding it still, everything is till a bit blurry and grainy as all get out.  Don't waste your money- for a cheap camera, this one is probably the worst option out there.  Spend a little more money and get a step up.

Reviews.Title: Good camera.  Sharp pictures.  No complaints.
Reviews.Author: Char
Reviews.Content: Can't understand why customers are not getting better results with this camera and are giving it a bad grade.  I've had no problems with it.  It takes sharp pictures even when I snap a quick shot without aiming carefully.  (Only problem I have with it is when I don't use it for awhile, I forget the procedure for setting the various functions [like flash or no flash, etc.] and then it's a nuisance to have to refer back to the Help guide online.  For easier reference, am planning to print out the manual and keep it with the camera.  If I used it often, I would not have this problem.)Have owned this camera for four years.I think the camera would be too complex for a young child, but I could be wrong.  Maybe would be okay for age 10 and up.(This Vivicam 7022 comes in other colors besides purple.  Mine is black.)

Reviews.Title: WORST CAMERA EVER!
Reviews.Author: M. B. Halloran
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA CANT FOCUS UNLESS YOU ARE A STATUE! meaning you have to be perfectly, and I do mean PERFECTLY still to take a clear picture. We have tried all the settings, called for customer support, its a mess. We got this for our daughter  for christmas. And as soon as I am done leaving this review , I am buying her a different camera- one that actually works. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!

Reviews.Title: Camera was fine for price
Reviews.Author: Galen Eddy
Reviews.Content: This camera was okay for first purchase, worked ok, used up batteries real fast, but the end came when it went through the washing machine and dryer. OOPS!

Reviews.Title: perfect quick-snap camera
Reviews.Author: JCM Jr "manicdrums"
Reviews.Content: perfect for quick snaps while on the move.  Don't expect anything dazzling to come from this little camera, though.  The viewfinder can be tricky to see in the open air.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: paula white-harris
Reviews.Content: I wasted my money and by the time I tried to use it, it was too late to send back.

Reviews.Title: purple not hot pink
Reviews.Author: ktsgran
Reviews.Content: Nice small camera. takes adequate pixs. Was delivered quickly still in original wrappingys. I ordered purple and received hot pink but oh well, no big deal. Would recommend to someone who wants the occasional snap shot or a beginner.

Reviews.Title: what i learned
Reviews.Author: jason moore
Reviews.Content: It is broken doesn't work ! ad said used not broken . when it arrived , it was wrapped and put under the tree . I deleted the email when it arrived , now I don't even know who to contact about an exchange ! so unhappy . What I learned is never order from AMAZON.COM , AND SAVE EMAIL . SO I hope someone reads this and can help me , if so my email is jjm714@gmail.com please help  Thanks  Jason Moore

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Eric Stary
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my 6 year old.  Its such a piece of junk, its practically useless.  If your looking for a camera as a adult, this is not it.

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: brighteyes
Reviews.Content: i got this camera for my guy,and because i all ready have one.he loves his as i love mine. it is a great camera. i use mine all the time. thanks for the great product.
